Katra-Shivkhori-Kashmir

Tour Overview

Take this opportunity to explore the paradisiacal Vale of Kashmir with the 4 nights 5 days. Katra-Kashmir package ex Katra. The popular Package covers the cities of Shivkhori, Srinagar and Gulmarg. The Kashmir tour itinerary begins with a pick-up from Karta and is ideal for those who wish to head on to Kashmir after their Vaishno Devi Darshan.

ðŸ•˜ Day 1: Katra-Shivkhori-Katra (70 Kms One way (Approx 3 hoursâ€™ Drive)

Pickup from Katra go for an excursion to Shivkhori temple, which is around 70 kms and takes 3 hrs each way to reach. Shivkhori means the cave of Lord Shiva. While driving to the holy place, you will also visit two holy spots enroute. The first one is Aghar Jitto (6 kms from Katra), which is the shrine of revolutionary Baba Jitto. Next visit the shrine of Nau Deviyan (10 kms from Katra). On reaching Shivkhori, you will be dropped at the starting point of the yatra to the Shivling which is around 4 kms steep walk. The yatra and darshan can take anytime between 1.5 to 3 hours. After darshan, return back to the starting point and get transferred back to the hotel. Overnight stay at the hotel In Katra.

ðŸ•˜ Day 2: Katra â€“ Srinagar (270 KMS 7 hoursâ€™ Drive)

Katra â€“ Srinagar (270 KMS 7 hoursâ€™ Drive)

ðŸ•˜ Day 3: Srinagar Local Sightseeing.

Early Morning After Breakfast from Hotel our representative will assist you in your transfer to Srinagar. En route, enjoy a sightseeing tour of Patnitop and marvel at the splendid views. After drinking in the scenic wonders, continue your journey towards Srinagar. Once you reach, check-in to the hotel and freshen up. delicious dinner and overnight stay. After healthy breakfast at the houseboat, Visit to famous Mughal Gardens Chashma Shahi, Nishat, Shalimar Mughal laid out in the 16th century & these fall along the bank of Dal-lake in the heart of Srinagar city .Pari Mahal, Botanical Garden, evening visit Market, overnight stay at Hotel.

ðŸ•˜ Day 4: Katra Shivkhori Kashmir Tour

Early morning proceed to Gulmarg driving past willow trees, fast flowing streams and lush green meadows. Gulmarg â€“ the meadow of flowers is an apt term for this idyllic flower-laden meadow offering a spectacular view of towering snow-capped peaks covered with dense forests of tall conifers and gigantic fir and pine trees. Stroll leisurely or take pony rides (by your own payment) across the green meadow to one of the worldâ€™s highest Golf Course. A must is a fun-filled ride in the newly introduced Gondola lift (by your own payment). Return to Srinagar in the evening and enjoy a comfortable overnight stay at Hotel in Srinagar.

ðŸ•˜ Day 5: Srinagar-Katra- Departure

After breakfast leave for full day trip to Gulmarg known as â€˜Meadow of flowers. It is one of the Indiaâ€™s premier Hill resorts. Gulmarg today is not merely a mountain resort of exceptional beauty â€“ It also turns into Indiaâ€™s premier Ski resort in winter. The Gondola Cable Car offers rides to the top of Apharwat range to a height of 14000 ft for viewing the Himalayan Peaks in summer and for downhill skiing in winter. Overnight stay at Hotel in Srinagar.

ðŸ•˜ Day 6: Srinagar - Airport

After breakfast, leave from Srinagar and drive to Katra to board your flight/train with memorable experiences of Royal Horizon Tours & Travels.
